tag_list: social-media, buzz-logic, investor, cfo, aditive, pilot, advertising
overview: Samuel D. Long has been deeply immersed with the finance of technology start-ups since 1995, and is currently CFO at ADITIVE, Inc. (www.aditive.com). Prior to ADITIVE, Mr. Long operated super-angel fund Pinpoint Ventures, where his investment history includes BuzzLogic, Daptive (formerly eProject, sold to Parallax Capital for $12.6M), Performant (sold to Mercury Interactive for $22.5M), Allrecipes.com (sold to Readersâ€™ Digest for $66M) and Terabeam (sold to YDI Wireless for $52M). Sam holds a BA in English from Case Western Reserve University (CWRU), an MBA from CWRUâ€™s Weatherhead School of Management, serves on the boards of ADITIVE and Springcreek Advisors, is an active pilot and a beekeeper.
